org.fluidity.composition.container

Interface ComponentCache


  • public interface ComponentCache
    Caches components by context on behalf of a container. Instances of this cache are provided for dependency injection container implementations to cache instantiated components.

    This cache is thread safe.

    Usage

     final ContainerServices services = …;

 final ComponentCache cache = services.newCache(false);

 final ComponentCache.Instance factory = new ComponentCache.Instance() {
   public Object create() {
     return new Object();
   }
 }

 …

 final ComponentContext context1 = …;
 final ComponentContext context2 = …;

 final Object instance1 = cache.lookup(null, "sample", context1, Object.class, factory);
 final Object instance2 = cache.lookup(null, "sample", context1, Object.class, factory);
 final Object instance3 = cache.lookup(null, "sample", context2, Object.class, factory);

 assert instance2 == instance1;
 assert instance3 != instance2;

 final Object instance4 = cache.lookup("domain", "sample", context2, Object.class, factory);
 final Object instance5 = cache.lookup("domain", "sample", context2, Object.class, factory);

 assert instance4 != instance3;
 assert instance5 == instance4;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ComponentCache.Domain
      A caching domain.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object lookup(ComponentCache.Domain domain, String source, ComponentContext context, Class<?> api, Supplier factory)
      Looks up, and instantiates if necessary using the supplied factory, the cached component.

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        Object lookup(ComponentCache.Domain domain,
              String source,
              ComponentContext context,
              Class<?> api,
              Supplier factory)
        Looks up, and instantiates if necessary using the supplied factory, the cached component. If factory is null, only lookup is done with no instantiation on cache miss.
        Parameters:
        domain - the object that segregates cached instances, never null; a separate instance will be cached for different domains.
        source - identifies in log messages the entity that is creating instances through this cache.
        context - the context for the component to cache against.
        api - the interface the component implements.
        factory - the command that performs instantiation of the component if it was not yet found in the cache; if null, only a lookup is done, otherwise instantiation is attempted if the no cached instance is found.
        Returns:
        the component instance or null.
